title: Vow of Hell
description: They say the vows you take on your wedding day are sacred.Mine are drenched in greed and hatred.A beautiful lie hiding the ugly truth lying beyond.Saint AstorÂ is the big bad wolf I'm trying to run from.He is the only one that can see beyond my veil of deception.The only one who has the power to break me into a million pieces.My forbidden crush, coming to life in the form of a nightmare.I had a plan to escape from the crutches of a loveless marriage.Fall in love with someone else.But when that turns sour, the media's golden boy comes to collect.And I can't do anything except lay my soul at his feet and hope he doesn't burn it.Vow of Hell is a complete standalone and a part of the City of Stars series.
author: Clara Elroy
